text: @messenger bug detected . The app change all day between the past and new update. Please fix it
Its not a big problem lol
I actually have a real problem with your product, however I don't have a Facebook account so I can't contact support. Can you help me?

@messenger I just uninstalled Messenger.  I cannot find a fix for my issue. Messenger all of a sudden started thinking my first language is French...It keeps autocorrecting from my English typing into French.  It is impossible to use the app. My setting is English

@messenger has a serious #bug, one can share live video on screen, even after he/she blocked him/her.
This needs to be fixed immediately.
@messenger fix your photo quality please AMPANGIT NG BAGONG UPDATE!
@messenger please fix your app keeps going back to the old design every once in a while
@messenger after deleting a message, it shouldn't leave behind a residue that the message was deleted. And after forwarding a message, it shouldn't show that the message was forwarded. Please fix it.
@messenger i am getting frustrated with the quality of the pictures I am sending through messenger! My recipient always complains! Watdahell
@messenger after so many continuous updates here in the Philippines, we still don't have darkmode. It's so frustrating. Other countries have it already, why not us?
@messenger Messenger team I have trouble sending messages to people from yesterday. Please help me. Thanks Messenger Team
